sentences.en: A hot cloth pressed against your jaw will usually soothe a toothache.
sentences.cn: 把热毛巾放在下巴上一般能缓解牙痛.

sentences.en: A serious toothache is an intense pain.
sentences.cn: 严重的牙痛是一种剧烈的疼痛.

sentences.en: A toothache can get you down.

sentences.cn: 牙疼使我的下巴难受极了.
你在忍受牙疼的痛苦 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't just try to put up with your toothache. Go and see the dentist.
sentences.cn: 你牙疼别硬挺着, 快去治治吧.

sentences.en: He gets irritable when he's got toothache.
sentences.cn: 他牙一疼就很容易发脾气.

sentences.en: Her face swelled with the toothache.
sentences.cn: 她的脸由于牙疼而肿了起来.

sentences.en: His bad temper is easily accountable; he has had a toothache all day.
sentences.cn: 他的坏脾气是容易理解的, 因他整日牙痛.

sentences.en: His face swelled up with the toothache.
I can wait, but my toothache can't!
sentences.cn: 我倒是可以等.可是我的牙痛等不了 啊 !

sentences.en: I had terrible toothache all last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚我一整夜牙疼得厉害。

sentences.en: I have got toothache, so I must go to a dentist.
sentences.cn: 我牙疼, 必须去看牙医.

sentences.en: She suffered tortures from a toothache.
